content.rendered:
Overview

Nirala Estate Noida Extension is a residential project launched by Nirala World Group and Madhusudan SMC. It is located at GH-04 in Tech Zone-4, Greater Noida West. After Sucess Of Nirala Estate Phase 1 & 2 Nirala Group has launched Nirala Estate Phase 3 and Nirala Estate phase 4. The project has 18 towers spreading over an area of 25 acres of land. It has 80% of open space and is surrounded with full of greenery. It comprises of 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK flats with some exclusive features making it one of the best package for their customers. Almost all the flats in this project are 3 sides open ensuring proper ventilation which is very important for a healthy lifestyle. Moreover, people looking properties for investment could also consider Nirala Estate, as price appreciation in future in this location is an assurance. The sizes of the flats in this project are ranging from 955 sq. ft. to 2320 sq. ft. and are vastu-compliant. Nirala Estate offers apartments that are well-ventilated and are designed with the concept of affordable housing to deliver an extra lavish lifestyle.

2, 3 & 4 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS IN TECHZONE - 4, GREATER NOIDA

HIGHLIGHTS
  • Phase 1 RERA No: UPRERAPRJ519100
  • PHASE 3 & 4 RERA No: UPRERAPRJ265789
  • PROJECT LOCATION: GH-04, Tech Zone-IV, Greater Noida West
  • CONFIGURATION: 2, 3 & 4 BHK Apartments
  • TOTAL LAND AREA: 25 Acres
  • SIZE RANGE: 955 – 2320 sq.ft.
  • TOTAL TOWERS: 18 Towers
  • TOTAL UNITS NO: 1948 UNITS
  • TOTAL FLOORS: Stilt + 24 floors
  • Phase 1 POSSESSION DATE: Delivered
  • PHASE 3 & 4 POSSESSION DATE: DECEMBER 2024
  • Vitrified tiles in drawing/dining/bedrooms and kitchen
  • Copper wiring in concealed PVC conduits Sufficient light and power points Provision for TV
  • Copper wiring in Telephone points in living room and all bedrooms
  • Granite top working platform
  • White sanitary wares with European WC, CP fittings
  • Security guard at Project main entrance. CCTV Surveillance.
  • RCC structure as per code of practic

FLOOR PLANS

SITE LAYOUT

LOCATION MAP

  • 5 min drive to Pari Chowk Gr. Noida
  • 5 min drive to Yamuna Expressway
  • 10 min drive to Atta Market
  • 15 min drive to Kalindi Kunj
  • 15 min drive to Kalindi Kunj
  • 15 min drive to DND
  • 20 min drive to Akshardham Temple and NH 24 

ABOUT NIRALA WORLD

Nirala World was founded in 1996 and known for creating new standards in the real estate sector. The company is dedicated to satisfying evolving India demands for new spaces. The aim of the group is designing luxury homes for people who want to experience the lifestyle for the elite. Holding a stern pledge to create supremacy, Nirala India delights homebuyers with the creativity and beauty in our projects. 

Site Address : GH-04, Tech Zone IV, Noida Extension, Patwari, Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201306

B R O C H U R E   D O W N L O A D

Do you want to talk with one of our Real Estate Experts?

Call Now: +91 9565 699 699
